chunks.text: ### Persons seeking to enter the UK for short-term study
chunks.summary: This provision applies to individuals seeking short-term study in the UK. They must secure entry clearance and meet specific requirements, including proof of acceptance by an authorized educational institution; exceptions or thresholds are not specified.
